dishes.name: Aztec Soup
dishes.description: Strips of fried tortillas topped with chicken broth, tomato, pepper, garlic, coriander, cheese, avocado, onion and sour cream.

dishes.name: Burritos
dishes.description: Cylindrically rolled flour tortilla stuffed with different ingredients of choice.

dishes.name: Ceviche
dishes.description: Raw fish, onion, tomato, chilies, coriander, and lemon.

dishes.name: Chilaquiles
dishes.description: Fried corn tortilla soaked in red sauce, topped with shredded chicken, chorizo, beef and a sunny side up egg.

dishes.name: Enchiladas
dishes.description: Corn tortilla dipped in hot sauce, filled with chicken stew and vegetables.

dishes.name: Flautas
dishes.description: Rolled corn tortilla fried and filled with mashed potato, cheese, chicken and sour cream on top.

dishes.name: Quesadilla
dishes.description: Grilled corn tortilla folded in half, stuffed with cheese and pico de gallo.

dishes.name: Tacos
dishes.description: Get out if you don't know tacos already...

dishes.name: Tamales
dishes.description: Shredded chicken with green salsa wrapped in corn leaves.

dishes.name: Horchata
dishes.description: The most delicious drink in the world.
